short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Access your templates anywhere on the web.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TemplateIn - the ultimate Chrome extension that'll change the way you work forever! 

With TemplateIn, you can create and access your templates from anywhere on the web, making your work faster and more efficient than ever before.

★ Professional use cases

Whether you're a recruiter looking to send messages to talents, a salesperson prospecting for leads, or a product manager creating templates for feature descriptions, TemplateIn has got you covered. With our easy-to-use interface and intuitive design, you can create templates for anything and everything!

★ One place to rule them all

But that's not all - TemplateIn also helps you stay organized and on top of your game with its comment feature. Leave notes and feedback for yourself or your team members, and ensure that your templates are always up-to-date and accurate.

★ AI assistant

If you're worried about writing the perfect message, don't be! TemplateIn comes equipped with AI-powered text optimization that suggests improvements and tweaks to make your templates even more effective.

★ Usage tracking

With our built-in usage tracking, you can see just how many times your templates have been used, so you can adjust and improve them over time. So why wait? Try TemplateIn today and join the hundreds of individuals and teams who are already using it to streamline their work and boost productivity!

★ Get started

TemplateIn extension requires an account on template-in.com. You can choose a personal plan or a team depending of you usage.

Access your templates from anywhere on the web, in just a click or shortcut.
TemplateIn for Chrome lets you find immediately all yours or your company templates.
Increase you productivity and say goodbye to endless search and copy and paste.
